# Bayesian Probit

```{r}
y <- c(taiwan$Vote)
y <- replace(y, y == 1, 0)
y <- replace(y, y == 2, 1)
```


```{r}
gender <- c(taiwan$Gender)
age <- c(taiwan$Age)
education <- c(taiwan$Education)
income <- c(taiwan$Income)
polinterest <- c(taiwan$PolInterest)
demsat <- c(taiwan$DemSat)
understandpol <- c(taiwan$UnderstandPol)
trustgov <- c(taiwan$TrustGov)
```

```{r}
X<-cbind(gender,age,education, income,polinterest,demsat,understandpol,trustgov)
betabar <- rep(0, nrow(X))
A <- (1/nrow(X))*t(X)%*%X
R <- 10000
keep <- 1
nprint <- 0
```

```{r}
Data <- list(y=y, X=X)
Prior <- list(A=A)
Mcmc <- list(R=R, keep=keep, nprint=nprint)
```


```{r}
out <- rbprobitGibbs(Data, Prior, Mcmc)
```

```{r}
betas <- out$betadraw
```


```{r}
plot(density(betas[,2]), xlab = expression(beta_2),
     main = expression(paste("Density of Coefficient for Age")))
abline(v = mean(betas[,2]), col = "red")
```
```{r}
plot(density(betas[,4]), xlab = expression(beta_4),
     main = expression(paste("Density of Coefficient for Income")))
abline(v = mean(betas[,4]), col = "red")
```

```{r}
plot(density(betas[,5]), xlab = expression(beta_5),
     main = expression(paste("Density of Coefficient for Political Interest")))
abline(v = mean(betas[,5]), col = "red")
```
